casebody.data:
In the Matter of Cynthia MANOCHERIAN, et al., Appellants,
v.
ZONING BOARD OF APPEALS OF the TOWN OF NEW CASTLE, et al., Respondents. In the Matter of Laura Houston Whitlinger, et al., Appellants,
v.
Zoning Board of Appeals of the Town of New Castle, et al., Respondents. Motion No: 2019-224 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided May 9, 2019

Motion for reargument of motion for leave to appeal denied [see 32 N.Y.3d 1185, 95 N.Y.S.3d 138, 119 N.E.3d 778 (2019) ].
